body:
Hi dears,
I have some problems in Therm component. First of all I wanted to calculate heat transfer rate for a profile section but therm components couldn't export the real shape to therm software and I faced some errors in grasshopper algorithm. I tried a simpler form to make sure the algorithm works, it did but not with my profile section. I really appreciate if you could guide me how to fix this.    Moreover, I couldn't import window glazing text file in to grasshopper. Actually window save the file and I define the path but the component shows an error: "1. Solution exception:invalid literal for float(): y 10.0 S"  Thanks in advance.
